title: Himi 241
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Sīsū foaki mai
‘A e folofola;
Ko e tenga mo’oni,
Pea ta’engata.
2.
Pea ‘e tupu ai,
‘A ho Kosipeli,
‘I he potu kotoa pē
‘O e fonua ni.
3.
‘O mafola atu,
‘I he fu’u mālohi;
Ki māmani kotoa pē
‘I ho māfimafi.
4.
‘O ne faka’auha,
‘A e ngāue kovi,
‘A e angahala, pea
Mo e ta’etui.
5.
Ke fa’a ngāue ia,
‘I he loto tui,
Ke hoko ‘o tonuhia,
‘I ho angalelei.
6.
Pea fakama’a
‘A e laumālie
Pea fonu, ‘i he ‘ofa
‘Oku mo’onia.
7.
Ke mau fonu, ‘Eiki,
‘I ho’o mo’ui,
Pea mau ma’u, ‘i ‘olunga,
‘A e fu’u taloni. *
